net.proteusframework.core.io

Class EntityUtilWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.PrintWriter
        • net.proteusframework.core.io.EntityUtilWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class EntityUtilWriter
extends PrintWriter
    PrintWriter with added methods for outputting entity encoded data.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • appendEmptyTagClose

        public EntityUtilWriter appendEmptyTagClose()
        Print out close for an empty tag.

        This will be either "/>" or ">". depending on isXHTML().

        This is useful for empty tags like LINK, INPUT, etc.
        Returns:
        this writer.

        value - the value.
        Returns:
        the writer.

        Returns:
        the writer.

      • appendHTMLDataWithBreak

        public EntityUtilWriter appendHTMLDataWithBreak(CharSequence cdata)
        Append HTML character data. All newlines will be output as BR tags. The data will be escaped.
        Parameters:
        cdata - the character data.
        Returns:
        the writer.

      • escapeAttribute

        public String escapeAttribute(CharSequence characters)
        Escape characters for attributes.

        This returns the escaped characters instead of writing them to the writer. This is useful when combined with other escaping before output via this writer.

        Parameters:
        characters - the characters.
        Returns:
        return the escaped string.

      • escapeData

        public String escapeData(CharSequence characters)
        Escape characters for HTML/XHTML based on isXHTML().

        This returns the escaped characters instead of writing them to the writer. This is useful when combined with other escaping before output via this writer.

        Parameters:
        characters - the characters.
        Returns:
        return the escaped string.

      • escapeDataWithBreak

        public String escapeDataWithBreak(CharSequence characters)
        Escape characters for HTML/XHTML based on isXHTML() with newlines replaced with BR tags.

        This returns the escaped characters instead of writing them to the writer. This is useful when combined with other escaping before output via this writer.

        Parameters:
        characters - the characters.
        Returns:
        return the escaped string.

      • escapeHTML

        public String escapeHTML(CharSequence characters)
        Escape characters for HTML.

        This returns the escaped characters instead of writing them to the writer. This is useful when combined with other escaping before output via this writer.

        Parameters:
        characters - the characters.
        Returns:
        return the escaped string.

      • escapeHTMLWithBreak

        public String escapeHTMLWithBreak(CharSequence characters)
        Escape characters for HTML with newlines replaced with BR tags.

        This returns the escaped characters instead of writing them to the writer. This is useful when combined with other escaping before output via this writer.

        Parameters:
        characters - the characters.
        Returns:
        return the escaped string.

      • formatEscapedData

        public EntityUtilWriter formatEscapedData(CharSequence format,
                                 Object... args)
        Format XHTML character data. The format and arguments will be escaped. The data will be escaped according to isXHTML().
        Parameters:
        format - A format string as described in Format string syntax.
        args - Arguments referenced by the format specifiers in the format string. If there are more arguments than format specifiers, the extra arguments are ignored. The number of arguments is variable and may be zero. The maximum number of arguments is limited by the maximum dimension of a Java array as defined by the Java Virtual Machine Specification. The behaviour on a null argument depends on the conversion.
        Returns:
        the writer.

      • formatEscapedDataWithBreak

        public EntityUtilWriter formatEscapedDataWithBreak(CharSequence format,
                                          Object... args)
        Format XHTML character data. All newlines will be output as BR tags. The format and arguments will be escaped. The data will be escaped according to isXHTML().
        Parameters:
        format - A format string as described in Format string syntax.
        args - Arguments referenced by the format specifiers in the format string. If there are more arguments than format specifiers, the extra arguments are ignored. The number of arguments is variable and may be zero. The maximum number of arguments is limited by the maximum dimension of a Java array as defined by the Java Virtual Machine Specification. The behaviour on a null argument depends on the conversion.
        Returns:
        the writer.
